description: Several former skating champions have accused three trainers of sexually abusing them as teenagers.
title: Sarah Abitbol: French ice skating boss quits amid sex abuse scandal
title_page: Sarah Abitbol: French ice skating boss quits amid sex abuse scandal - BBC News
maintext: Speaking after a meeting of the French Ice Sports Federation (FFSG) council in Paris, Mr Gailhaguet, 66, said: "I have taken the wise decision to resign from my post... I have taken this decision with composure, with dignity, but without any bitterness before this injustice."
